Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Northbound Reroute near Damen/Monroe
ShortDescription: NB 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Jackson, Western, Madison & Damen, due to street blockage near Damen/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Jackson, Western, Madison and Damen, due to street blockage near Damen/Monroe.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 63rd/Wentworth
ShortDescription: EB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, Michigan and 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Wentworth, 59th, Michigan and 63rd, due to street blockage near 63rd/Wentworth.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
